start.speaker: guido
start.text: Damn it is really busy over here, and everyone looks exactly the same.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: So human, I hear that you are trying to steal my valued scepter.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Yes but I need it for my house.

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Congratulations on finally receiving my sceptre.

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Thanks... If only it was this easy in the real game.

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: You should not give up so easily, those who persist will be rewarded.

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Tell that to all the bots over there...

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Bots? There are no bots allowed in my pyramid.

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Well you should check your security if that is the case...

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Nonsense! Anyway, I wish you the best of luck on the rest of your adventure.
